argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | strfvd.e | |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) |
| 2 |  | strfvd.s | |- ( ph -> S e. V ) |
| 3 |  | strfvd.f | |- ( ph -> Fun S ) |
| 4 |  | strfvd.n | |- ( ph -> <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_strfvnd | |- ( ph -> ( E ` S ) = ( S ` ( E ` ndx ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_funopfv | |- ( Fun S -> ( <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S -> ( S ` ( E ` ndx ) ) = C ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 6 | #P_sylc | |- ( ph -> ( S ` ( E ` ndx ) ) = C ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> C = ( E ` S ) ) |
